meanings.definition: To redesign or alter a process or system for improved efficiency or performance.
meanings.sent1: The company reengineered their website to make it faster and easier to use.
meanings.sent2: She reengineered the old car engine to make it run more smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The chef reengineered the traditional recipe by adding a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: The team reengineered their strategy to outsmart the competition.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reengineered the DNA to create a new type of plant.

meanings.definition: The act of making changes to a product or system in order to improve it.
meanings.sent1: The reengineered software had fewer bugs and ran faster than before.
meanings.sent2: After the reengineering, the product became more user-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The reengineered machine worked like a charm, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The reengineered design revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The reengineered process saved the company time and money.

meanings.definition: The process of reorganizing or restructuring something in a new way.
meanings.sent1: The reengineered layout of the office improved communication among employees.
meanings.sent2: The reengineering of the department led to increased productivity.
meanings.sent3: The reengineered schedule made everyone's work-life balance better.
meanings.sent4: The reengineered structure of the organization brought about positive changes.
meanings.sent5: The reengineered plan streamlined the workflow and reduced errors.
